articles.title: Firefighters struggle to control fires near Chernobyl
articles.description: Firefighters in Ukraine are working to bring forest fires under control in the area around the former Chernobyl nuclear power plant.
articles.content:
Firefighters in Ukraine are working to bring forest fires under control in the area around the former Chernobyl nuclear power plant.
The plant was the site of the world's worst nuclear accident in 1986.
The blaze has burned through over 3,000 hectares in a … [+1158 chars]
